evidence.claim: Medtronic's cloud infrastructure relies on AWS and Azure for various health data processing.
Medtronic adheres to HIPAA guidelines for all its digital health technologies.
They utilize FHIR for interoperability within their health technology platforms.
Integration with EHRs through HL7 standards is prioritized in Medtronic's offerings.

icp.icp_reason: No clear evidence of X12 transaction or EDI use cases found on Medtronic's site.
